title.rendered: Not Ready for a Neck Lift?: Plastic Surgery Alternatives

content.rendered:
The neck tends to get overlooked when it comes to plastic surgery and cosmetic care. However, usually when patients come in for a facial rejuvenation such as an extended deep plane facelift, a neck lift is usually a necessary addition to their procedure. 

Your neck often shows the earliest signs of aging, making you look older than you feel. Whether you’re struggling with a “turkey neck” or a “tech neck,” you might be wondering what options are available for you if you’re not ready for a full neck lift procedure.

At Pearlman Aesthetic Surgery we know that not everyone is ready for a full surgery right out of the gate. While there is no replacing the results of a surgical neck lift, plastic surgery alternatives can still be an effective option for many patients. 

Alternatives to a Neck Lift Surgery in NYC

These procedures are minimally or noninvasive solutions to skin laxity and other concerns for the neck.

MyEllevate®

MyEllevate is a minimally invasive neck tightening technique that uses suture suspension. With a revolutionary light guided system and a few tiny incisions, MyEllevate can be a great alternative for a neck lift.

FaceTite

For patients looking to tighten their jowls and jawline to reverse facial sagging, FaceTite is an effective technique that utilizes radiofrequency energy. And there’s no surgery or downtime required! 

Nécolleté™

Dr. Pearlman himself developed the Nécolleté™ technique which incorporates multiple types of treatments to rejuvenate the neck and the décolleté. We combine ultrasound, laser skin resurfacing, and micropenning all customized for your specific needs and goals.

Ultherapy

A gentle, non-invasive treatment, Ultherapy is FDA-approved to treat loose, sagging skin. The waves from the ultrasound device penetrate the SMAS layers (the same area treated in a facelift) to stimulate collagen growth and firm the skin. Ultherapy can achieve very similar results to a facelift procedure without the same downtime and recovery.

Kybella

The least invasive of the cosmetic options for the neck, Kybella is a simple injectable.  It safely dissolves fat from under the chin right in the office exam chair! With an average of 3 treatments Kybella can get rid of a double chin, permanently.

Interested in a neck lift? Plastic surgery alternatives? Reach out and let’s talk.

Schedule a consultation and come visit us at Pearlman Aesthetic Surgery. We’re committed to providing natural results that help you look and feel your best. It’s all about supporting your personal aesthetic vision with our expertise and insight.

Nothing quite replaces coming in for an office visit, but we also offer a procedure match tool that allows you to receive treatment recommendations via email! Just answer a few questions about your specific areas of interest . Then you’ll receive customized guidance right in your inbox.
